alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 2:28PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Box Elder County through 315 PM MDT... At 227 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Park Valley, or 42 miles southeast of Oakley Reservoir, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Park Valley. This includes Utah Route 30 between mile markers 26 and 43, and between mile markers 51 and 61. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
